description:
Patrick Wilson (Insidious, The Phantom of The Opera) tells Justin all about his start on Broadway, the moment he knew he needed to work with director James Wan, and what it was like to go inside the moon in his newest film.

Catch Moonfall only in theatres.

Listen to Welcome to Our Show on Apple Podcast, Spotify, or wherever you get your podcasts.
